summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6113 for the improvement of The Alley in Block 1, May Addition, being the alley between 15th Avenue Northeast and University Way from East 56th Street to Ravenna Boulevard; and certain other streets, avenues and alleys; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 84461, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
